title: Remove slow collation support
description: The support for slow collations is documented as deprecated and "will be removed in 5.0".

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content:
Here is a patch. It removes:

	SlowCollatedStringComparator
	SlowCollatedTermRangeFilter
	SlowCollatedTermRangeQuery
	SlowCollatedTermRangeTermsEnum
